question:
Which of the following statements are correct with respect to mangroves?
1. In mangroves leaves are thick and contain salt secreting glands.
2. The trees of mangroves exhibit viviparity mode of reproduction. i.e. seeds germinate in the tree itself.
3. Adventitious roots which emerge from the main trunk of a tree above ground level are known as stilt roots.
Select the correct option from the codes given below:
explanation: In mangroves leaves are thick and contain salt secreting glands. The trees of mangroves exhibit viviparity mode of reproduction. i.e. seeds germinate in the tree itself. Adventitious roots which emerge from the main trunk of a tree above ground level are known as stilt roots.
